metadata.title: CVE-2024-7539 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - high
metadata.description: oFono CUSD Stack-based Buffer Overflow Code Execution Vulnerability. Thisvulnerability allows local attackers to execute arbitrary code on affectedinstallations of oFono. An attacker must first obtain the ability toexecute code on the target modem in order to exploit this vulnerability.The specific flaw exists within the parsing of responses from AT+CUSDcommands. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of thelength of user-supplied data prior to copying it to a stack-based buffer.An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the contextof root. Was ZDI-CAN-23195.

criterions.comment: ofono package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
